rooms.name: Maiden Entry Hall
rooms.description: A grand entrance hall that welcomes guests and adheres to Vastu principles with proper directional alignment. Contains decorative elements inspired by Kerala architecture.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: An open living space adjoining the dining area, designed for relaxation and family gatherings, ensuring ample natural light from south-facing windows in line with Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: A semi-open kitchen-dining area that encourages interaction. The layout considers proper alignment for auspicious energy flow.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: A compact yet functional kitchen with modern amenities placed in the northwest to harness positive energies as per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Guest Room 1
rooms.description: A guest room with minimalistic design and essential facilities. Ensures privacy while still maintaining connectivity with common areas for convenience.

rooms.name: Guest Room 2
rooms.description: Additional guest accommodation with modern amenities and a small sitting area, arranged to ensure balanced energy distribution.

openings.description: Grand entry with Kerala-style woodwork and stone carvings ensuring proper alignment with Vastu directions.
Secondary entrance facilitating movement for service areas and connectivity to the private gym area.

additional_features.name: Swimming Pool
additional_features.description: An outdoor swimming pool designed in a rectangular shape, located towards the east side of the property following Vastu guidelines. The pool is integrated with landscaping that includes traditional Kerala plantations.

additional_features.name: Private Gym
additional_features.description: A compact, dedicated gym area on the ground floor utilizing space-efficient equipment and natural lighting, ensuring privacy and adherence to functional design principles.
